column4: I seem to be missing linux/config.h in the kernel tree anyone know how / where it's generated ?
glib header? which package is that ?
use synaptic to check the exact package name
sorry, but I'd get this for you in 30 seconds if I had an ubuntu box to hand
any idea what to search for ?
see if you can find the santised header package
sorry, its hard not having an ubuntu box to be exact with
so packages.ubuntu.org, searched leads to libdevel0-dev
which I installed, and it provides /usr/include/config/config.h
yeah, it means that the quickcam drivers are broken
